page.title: 10A Day in the Life...a Child
page.content: My name is Andrew Mark Dobson,and I live in School Road in Peak Dale.I am nine years old. Today my day started at eight o'clock when I woke up and got out of bed.I went down the stairs to get dressed and have my breakfast.I had cornflakes for my breakfast.After breakfast I watched the television.I watched TVam for half an hour then I had a wash and went to school.I go to Peak Dale County Primary School which is just down the road from my house. At school I played with my friends until the whistle went.Then I went inside.First we had an assembly.Mr Richards told us a story about King Midas _ everything he touched turned to gold.After assembly all the classes went back to their classrooms to work. My class works in the hall.My teacher is Mr Woodward.
